name: Combining modified arrays
instruction:
Write a function `arrayModifier` that takes two parameters:
* `array1` - the array from which the first and last elements will be removed;
* `array2` - the array to which the first and last elements of the `array1` array will be added.

The function should return a new array composed as follows:
* the first and the last elements of the array `array1` are deleted;
* the separated elements of the array `array1` are added to the beginning and end of the array `array2` respectively;
* A new array consisting of the combined elements of the modified `array1` and `array2` arrays is created and returned in the specified order.

Examples of running the function:
```javascript
arrayModifier(["cat", "dog", "bird", "fish"], [1, 2, 3]); // ["dog", "bird", "cat", 1, 2, 3, "fish"]
arrayModifier(["First", "Second", "Third", "Fourth"], ["A", "B", "C"]); // ["Second", "Third", "First", "A", "B", "C", "Fourth"]
```

Note: use `concat()` method.
